summary: This is an email chain from July 2019 between U.S. Attorney's Office (USAO) personnel in New York, forwarding a New York Times article about Jeffrey Epstein and Deutsche Bank. The emails discuss an ongoing AML investigation and a subpoena for documents.

events.title: NYT Article Published on Epstein and Deutsche Bank
events.description: A New York Times article is published regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Deutsche Bank, prompting internal email discussion among prosecutors.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office in New York was aware of and discussing a New York Times article about Jeffrey Epstein and Deutsche Bank in July 2019.
An AML (Anti-Money Laundering) investigation was underway, and a subpoena had been issued for documents from Deutsche Bank.
The email chain shows internal coordination among prosecutors to stay updated on the matter.
